RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduaзгo em Scienze Agrarie - Universitб Cattolica Del Sacro Cuore (Piacenza, Italia - 2008), maestrado em Produzioni Animali - Universitб Cattolica Del Sacro Cuore (Piacenza, Italia - 2010) e doutorado em Scuola per il sistema agroalimentare - Agrisystem - Universitб Cattolica Del Sacro Cuore (Piacenza, Italia - 2015). Foi collaborator cientнfico no laboratуrio de genйtica animal da Universitб Cattolica Del Sacro Cuore e do Laboratуrio de Bioquнmica e Biologia Molecular Animal (LBBMA) - UNESP - (Araзatuba - SP - BR). RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Marco Milanesi graduates in Agricoltural Science in 2008 at Universitа Cattolica del Sacro Cuore (Piacenza - Italy), where he also got his master degree in Animal Production in 2010. In 2015 he achieved the Ph.D. in Agro-food System (AGRISYSTEM) at Universitа Cattolica del Sacro Cuore (Piacenza). He worked at the Institute of Zootechnics of the Universitа Cattolica del Sacro Cuore in Piacenza and, as Postdoctoral Researcher, at Laboratory of Animal Biochemistry and Molecular Biology of the Sao Paulo State University (UNESP) in Araзatuba (SP ? Brazil). He has been involved in different research projects focusing on the use of molecular genetics in animal breeding and livestock biodiversity.
